comments.author: irako
comments.text:
Audit findings from repo sources (no live Notion access in this environment):

Canonical/spec sources disagree.

CLAUDE.md:

API Integration Guide.md:
- Required properties: Name, Type, Status, Estimated minutes, Mentioned, Suggested priority, Suggested reason.

mcp/notion/server.py:
- Reads/writes: Name(title), Status(status), Mentioned(number), Blocked(rich_text), Energy(select), Type(select), Complete Time(number), Priority(number).
- Status mapping includes Waiting On; uses Blocked (not Blocked

comments.author: irako
comments.text:
Audit notes (Google Calendar MCP server):
- Business logic (free/busy calc) lives in adapter; should move to mirage_core CalendarPort with AvailabilityWindow outputs.
- Hardcoded timezone 'America/Los_Angeles' for create_event; ignores user-configured timezone.
- Uses naive datetimes + appends 'Z' without timezone normalization; potential offset errors.
- get_free_time returns HH:MM strings instead of ISO timestamps; not aligned with core models.
- create_event tool may violate agent rule 'suggest, never commit' unless gated by explicit confirmation.
- OAuth flow uses local server interactive auth; not suitable for headless/daemon usage.
- Defaults (work_start/end) are embedded in tool schema and logic; should be config-driven (mirage_config).

comments.author: irako
comments.text:
Audit notes (Notion MCP server):
- Tool schemas are out of sync with canonical TaskStatus/TaskType. create_task only advertises Action/Project/Idea/Blocked, update_task only mentions Tasks/Projects/Ideas/Blocked/Done; missing Not Now/Waiting On/Won't Do despite schema/tasks.yaml.
- Business logic lives in adapter: status alias mapping, default Mentioned=1, energy capitalization, tag mapping to select, complete_time conversion. Should move into mirage_core (TaskCaptureService + TaskDraft/aliases).
- update_task uses status alias map but input schema still restricted; consider aligning input schema to core enums and reusing alias resolver.
- query_tasks and increment_task_mention duplicate repo logic; should be thin wrappers over mirage_core.adapters.NotionTaskRepository.
- update_page_content deletes all blocks blindly; consider safety guard or use core port if added.
